full_summary:
====================================

### Tender Announcement: F2402-220153-B Three Dimensional (3D) Scanners

**Tender Reference:** WS3885964740-Doc4289653293

**Publication Date:** January 3, 2024

**Closing Date and Time:** January 19, 2024 2:00 PM EST

### Background

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Marine Fish and Invertebrates group has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a three-dimensional (3D) scanner, including the associated processing software and training services, to the Winnipeg, Manitoba Freshwater Institute.

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Period:** January 26, 2024 to April 30, 2026
*   **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Bidder Requirements

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.
*   Failure to submit on time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Additional Information

*   The contractor selected will be required to provide the 3D scanner, software, and training services.
*   The procurement includes optional purchases.
*   The DFO will be responsible for the final acceptance of the contractor's work.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Diane Warnell (She/Her)
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
 ph: (ext) 
email: [diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:diane.warnell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

The complete notice can be accessed at: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18414988?extsite=MTg0MTQ5ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
